          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weathering of mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weathering der Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Désagrégation des montagnes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Weathering das montanhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Weathering delle montagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάβρωση των βουνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desgaste por la acción atmosférica de montañas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that mountains are worn away by weathering over millions of years. This problem challenges geologists to explain formations of new mountains.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">erosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weathering</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Berge weg durch 
Weathering über Millionen Jahren getragen werden. Dieses 
Problem fordert Geologen heraus, Anordnungen der neuen Berge zu 
erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des montagnes sont 
portées loin en survivant à à des millions finis d'années. 
Ce problème défie des géologues d'expliquer des formations de
nouvelles montagnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as montanhas estão 
desgastadas afastado pelo weathering sobre milhões dos anos. 
Este problema desafia geólogos explicar formações de 
montanhas novas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le montagne sono 
portate via da weathering sopra milioni di anni. Questo problema
sfida i geologi a spiegare le formazioni di nuove montagne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα βουνά φοριούνται 
μακριά από τη διάβρωση κατά τη διάρκεια των εκατομμυρίων των 
ετών. Αυτό το πρόβλημα προκαλεί τους γεωλόγους για να 
εξηγήσει τους σχηματισμούς των νέων βουνών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las montañas son 
desgastadas lejos por el desgaste por la acción atmosférica sobre 
millones de años. Este problema desafía a geólogos a explicar
formaciones de montañas nuevas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abnutzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
